elements.label: A Collection of Poetry
elements.description: 'The poet makes himself a seer by an immense, long, deliberate derangement of all the senses...' The opposite of wisdom, thankfully. [Study to gain a Glimmering: Lesson Learnt, which you may be able to use to increase Passion.]
